RESOURCE.NAME: Noun Phrase Chunker
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Implementation of the Ramshaw and Marcus base noun phrase chunker

PARAMETER.NAME: posTagURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the pos_tag_dict file.

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the rules file.

PARAMETER.NAME: posFeature
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the feature which holds the POS tag.

PARAMETER.NAME: unknownTag
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The chunk tag to use for an unknown POS tag.

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set used for input.

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set used for output.

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotations added to mark noun chunks.
